name: usetube-improved
description: crawl youtube with scraperapi without a YouTube api key (search videos, search channels, get all channel/playlist's videos)

scripts.build: npx tsc --build && npx minify dist/index.js > dist/index.min.js && rm dist/index.js && mv dist/index.min.js dist/index.js && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/README.md
scripts.release: rm -rf ./dist && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --access public

author: Freddy Diaz
